name: Radiant Idol
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Aura of False Divinity: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the radiant idol must make a DC 17+1d8 + 13 Wisdom saving throw, provided the radiant idol isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the radiant idol. A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, a creature is immune to this radiant idol's Aura of False Divinity for 24 hours.
traits.Magic Resistance: The radiant idol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
